page.title: 07SANDERS' COACHES.
page.content: CLAIRE AND I WENT TO{SANDERS' COACHES. SANDERS HAD{20 COACHES.}17 PEOPLE DRIVE THE BUSES WHICH COST Â£50,000 EACH. THE BUSES SET OUT AT 7:30_8:00 AM AND THEY ARE HOME AT 6:00. THEY SEND LOST PROPERTY TO SCHOOL. THEY HAVE 3_4 WEEKS HOLIDAY. THE BUSES ARE 40 FEET LONG AND{10 FEET HIGH.}THE FURTHEST THEY HAVE GONE IS NORWAY. THEY TRAVEL{400 MILES PER DAY.}SOME DRIVERS HAVE A UNIFORM AND IT IS DARK BROWN. SOME BUS DRIVERS DO NOT HAVE ANY LUNCH AT ALL. SANDERS TOOK OVER BENNET'S COACHES. SANDERS ARE A {PRIVATE COMPANY}AND THEY HAVE TAKEN OVER MANY BUS ROUTES FROM EASTERN COUNTIES. THEY GO TO NORWICH ONLY ONCE A DAY, BUT MR SANDERS' COACHES DO MORE TRIPS ON WEDNESDAYS AND SATURDAYS. SANDERS' COACHES TAKE OUR SCHOOL ON TRIPS TO{HOLLAND.
